title: My download keeps restarting.
body: I uninstalled League yesterday, and now I'm trying to reinstall and the download gets to around 23% and restarts over and over again.  I have deleted and reinstalled the client 10+ times.  It is not connection related, as I have great internet (University Wifi) and get around 23 ping in game.  Please Help.

replies.body: Same thing is happening to me. I just got a new computer today and the same thing for me, at 23 percent it just restarts again at 0 percent
I thought this was just me, but appearetly it isn't

Having your download get stuck before the 30% mark usually means that the client wasn't able to scan certain files due to permissions errors. Double check that your OS has [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) setup to allow League access, and also make sure you're running the installer with admin rights.
I tried this and it didn't work.  I might also want to mention that this is in the client.  It gets to around 23% in the client not the installer.

The client patch is what I was referring to as well, hence mentioning "30% mark usually means that the client wasn't able to scan". If updating your permissions didn't help, it may in fact just be related to hiccups in your connection. I'd hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) just to be safe though!
